articles.description: Anthony Davis became one of only five players in Lakers history to record a 30-point, 20-rebound game in the playoffs, as his dominant outing against the Warriors allowed Los Angeles to steal home-court advantage in the series.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- In the final 90 seconds of Game 1 of the Los Angeles Lakers' second-round series against the Golden State Warriors, Anthony Davis blocked a layup by Stephen Curry and corralled a reb… [+4341 chars]

articles.title: Nepal captain looks ahead as Asia Cup dream becomes a reality - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Nepal captain Rohit Paudel believes silverware at the ACC Premier Cup and a dazzling run of form is just the start of the team's push in the international game.
